ComicInfo.Summary: 'CAMELOT,' part 6 of 7! The new Round Table has been established and potential knights errant are beginning to arrive from worlds over - including one ragged and mysterious piece of work from who-knows-where? At the same time some of the early volunteers are sent on their first quests. Raise your hand if you think that will go smoothly.

ComicInfo.Title: A Day at the Lake. Part Five of Camelot
